info.title: JumpStart
info.description: Documentation for the REST APIs of JumpStart

msg.example: Unauthorized Access: Token value is invalid.

get.description: This is used to test if the API is up and running.

200.description: The API is up and running.

post.description: This is used to either register as a jobseeker or as an employer. The request body must include either "jobseeker" or "employer" on the 'typeofuser' property.
This is used to login users. It will send a JWT token, userType, and userData as a response in JSON format.

401.description: Error for invalid credentials

email.example: Email entered is not yet registered.

get.description: Retrieves data about the profile of a particular job seeker.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of a job seeker from database.

201.description: Successfully fetched job seeker profile data

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job seeker does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

patch.description: Job seekers can edit their own profile with this endpoint.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Invalid Token / Invalid User / Invalid User Type

404.description: Error. Job seeker does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of a job seeker from database.

get.description: Retrieves data about the profile of a particular employer.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of an employer from database.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

patch.description: Employers can edit their own profile with this endpoint.

profile.description.example: We specialize in creating transaction processing systems.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Invalid Token / Invalid User / Invalid User Type

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of an employer from database.

get.description: Retrieves all existing job offers' data.

201.description: Successfully fetched data of job offers.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

post.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Allows employer to post a job offer. 'jobTitle', 'jobDescription', 'jobCategory' 'salaryPerMonth' should be filled in the request body. The data extracted from the request body will then be inserted into the database into 'jobTitle', 'jobDescription', 'jobCategory' and 'salaryPerMonth' fields respectively. Optional fields include: 'skillsRequired'.

201.description: Successful Posting of a Job Offer.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Invalid Token / Invalid User / Invalid User Type

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

get.description: Retrieves a specific job offer's data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of a job offer from database.

200.description: Successfully fetched data of a job offer

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job offer does not exist.

msg.example: Job offer to be viewed does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

get.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Retrieves all own job offers with applications.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

get.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Retrieves one job offer with applications.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of a job offer from database.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job offer does not exist.

msg.example: Job offer to be viewed does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

patch.summary: Edit a Job Offer's Details Endpoint
patch.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Allows employer to edit a job offer. Employers cannot edit details of job offers that are not theirs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of a job offer from database.

200.description: Successful Editing of Job Offer details

msg.example: Successfully Updated Details of a Job Offer.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Invalid Token / Invalid User / Invalid User Type

404.description: Error. Job offer does not exist

msg.example: Job offer to be updated does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

delete.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Allows employer to delete a job offer. Employers cannot delete a job offer that are not theirs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Object ID of a job offer from database.

200.description: Successful Deletion of a Job Offer

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Invalid Token / Invalid User / Invalid User Type

404.description: Error. Job offer does not exist

msg.example: Job offer to be deleted does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

post.summary: Search Job Offers by Title Endpoint
post.description: Retrieves job offers' data based on job title entered in the request body. This operation functions similarly to SQL's LIKE keyword.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

post.summary: Search Job Offers by Category Endpoint
post.description: Retrieves job offers' data based on job category entered in the request body.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

post.summary: Search Job Offers by Salary Range Endpoint
post.description: Retrieves job offers' data based on salary range entered in the request body. This retrieves job offer by salary = gte(min) and lte(max).

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

get.description: JOB SEEKER ONLY. Retrieves all own job applications

200.description: Successful retrieval of own job applications

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

get.description: JOB SEEKER ONLY. Retrieves one job application

parameters.name: applicationid
parameters.description: Object ID of a job application from database.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job application does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

post.summary: Send Application to a Job Offer Endpoint
post.description: JOB SEEKER ONLY. Allows job seekers to send an application to a particular job offer

parameters.name: offerid
parameters.description: Object ID of a job offer from database.

201.description: Successfully sent an application to a job offer.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job offer does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

patch.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Allows employer to approve a particular job application.

parameters.name: applicationid
parameters.description: Object ID of a job application from database.

201.description: Successful approval of a job application.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job application does not exist.

500.description: Generic Error. Could be caused by network issue or failed connection to database.

patch.description: EMPLOYERS ONLY. Allows employer to deny a particular job application.

parameters.name: applicationid
parameters.description: Object ID of a job application from database.

201.description: Successful denial of a job application.

401.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is null.

403.description: Unauthorized Access. Token value is invalid.

404.description: Error. Job application does not exist.
